name: Alien Army (Christmas Edition)
description:
In the year 2078, near Christmas time,  Aliens has invaded Earth. There is only the Alien Army to save the world and Christmas. And you are in charge over this army.

This is the Christmas Edition of my game Alien Army. The gameplay is a simple and classic shooter. 

The controls:

- Move the soldiers with the arrow keys. (Alternative IJKL-keys)

- Shoot there gun with the (Q W E R T)- keys (see under the soldiers). 

- Buy new soldiers with Space Bar (Cost $ 100)(Not real money).

- Press escape to quit the game.

Good luck, have fun and merry Christmas
